name: Jade Eatery And Lounge
address: 1 Station Square #2, Forest Hills, NY 11375, USA

reviews.text: Nay was simply amazing he made sure my kids were taken care of. Food was delicious and the staff was very professional.

‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è Review:
Our server was amazing! The food and appetizers came out quickly ‚Äî fresh and hot. I‚Äôll definitely be coming back to have drinks and dinner here again!
The vibe was really nice and the food was great. Nay was an attentive and friendly waiter who made sure we had everything we needed. Definitely a spot I‚Äôd come back to.
Wonderful experience! Great vibes here! Yang was great! Highly recommend
Yang was an amazing server. She is the best!
The food was amazing. Aria our waitress was amazing. Definitely would recommend
Jimmy is the best waiter
Best Mongolian beef ever!!
Yang was great! The food is delicious and has a lot of variety. Will definetly come back here.
Nay was amazing and very friendly. Unfortunately the food wasnt that great.
Really good food and servers were prompt and thoughtful.... atmosphere was so so and dark.
I liked Jade before they changed their menu. I used to love their Sushi Burritos. They were so good. I‚Äôm not sure if it‚Äôs still on the menu.
Loved it! The restaurant is beautiful, the koi pond in the middle of the restaurant was a fun surprise. Food was delicious and drinks were amazing.
Our waitress Lee was very knowledgeable about the offerings and carefully guided our complex party to delicious conclusions.  And the food was every bit of amazing and delicious.
Our server Lee was wonderful! She gave excellent suggestions and was very attentive!

Nay was fabulous.  Place was great.
Food was delicious.
Nay was fabulous.
Such a lovely night with the most welcoming host, Jashan!
Food and atmosphere was amazing! Jashan was even more so, definitely helped complete our experience!
Jashan is such a sweetheart and I highly recommend them.
Jashan was a wonderful server, very attentive and friendly. Would definitely come again!
Da shan was great and the experience and ambiance was just right . I couldnt have asked for better seating
Jashan gave complimentary birthday treat with sparkler for us !
jashan was amazing

Jashan was excellent. He was friendly, attentive and very knowledge.  I haven't been here for a while, but was in the area and decided to stop by.  His service did not disappoint, and the food was also great. I am 100% pleased having visited this restaurant again. I will definitely be back again.
jashan was very competent and satisfied all of our needs for dinner!
Great service and food! Jashan was very helpful.
jashan served us, very kind and hospitality was amazing, and the food was SO GOOD
Jashan was great!
Jashan was so good!!!
Amazing
Danny was great, definitely coming back again! The Chili Fried Rice!!!!
Jassan was wonderful and patient. We had a lovely lunch.
Jashan was amazing
Jashan was amazing, he provided a wonderful service.
Thanks to Jashan for his excellent service!
Tashi, tashi and Danny was great guys and we love their service.
The best
Really great atmosphere, music, and ambiance at Jade. Our server Ria was amazing and dealt with our slow decision making skills with grace and a smile. Service was quick and lovely :)
Nay was great and super attentive
Ria was a great server, she was very attentive
We had a great time dining at Jade. Our waitress Ria was very attentive and the service was speedy. We live in Forest Hills and Jade is hands down one of our favorite locations in the area.
Ria was amazing.

Ria provided excellent service! The food was amazing, and Ria got us the perfect table with great lighting and quieter so we could eat and talk with our family dinner. The best crab rangoon and mango lassi you‚Äôll find!
Ria was amazing & efficient. The food was delicious & the environment was calm but also vibey. Highly recommend!
good food. ria was very attentive and nice! beautiful decor
Yang was incredible, she made my birthday even more special! ü§© ü´∂
Yang was such a friendly waitress, she was attentive and so joyful. The atmosphere and ambiance are beautiful and romantic. Great for drink dates and hang outs!
She was very good - great service Yang is the best!!!!! She made our birthday!

The price, quality, and serving sizes are unreal! My husband and I went here to try out their $18 lunch special. Not only were we incredibly impressed by the taste of the dishes we ordered, but there was also so much of it that we ended up taking most of it home! Highly recommend you pay this spot a visit. You'll certainly enjoy the walk there as well since it's located in such a scenic area.

Second time visiting and the food and drinks were just as good.
Made it 10 min before the lunch special was over 12-4 pm, which I highly recommend.
The host was quick to sit us and the servers were fast when taking our order.
The kitchen was a bit slower than last time but regardless the food was great! Maybe the soup could‚Äôve been warmer but that‚Äôs it.
I enjoyed my visit and would probably visit again this time just the bar to try it out!

One of the best halal restaraunts I have ever been to. The waiters are very nice and helpful, and even replaced an item that we didnt like.
It is somewhat pricey but I believe its worth it.
One of the best halal steaks we ever had and a pleasant atmosphere ‚ú®

The service and food was amazing. I was celebrating my birthday and they brought us a sparkler! Special shoutout to Nay, he checked on us constantly along with the other wait staffs. Nay also gave me a keychain as a gift! Overall, it was a great experience and we will definitely visit here again!

Atmosphere was amazing, sitting next to the fish was pretty cool. The food as also great. No long wait, sat immediately and had a great sever. Nays customer service was above and beyond. He is a great server overall. Please request him if you ever go.

Ambience was definitely romantic, music was on point. Service took the cake, at no point we had to call our waiter, and they honored restaurant week prices so it was even more affordable. We‚Äôre definitely adding to our favorite spots. P.s Nay is literally the best server

Tashiiiiiiii is Amazing!!!! Went on a Monday, (Yesterday) and had drinks and appetizers! Tashi, makes an EXCELLENT Expresso Martini w/Baileys!!! Very friendly, made good suggestions and overall great bartender /photographer.. yea, I had a photoshoot too üòÇüòÇüòç Definitely, will be back!!

FISHY. I‚Äôve never had such disgusting spicy tuna in my life. The black seared tuna was excellent sushi grade fish and well worth the price for the portion size but the fish in the rainbow roll, tuna tartare, and spicy tuna crispy rice was just awful. Somehow we racked up a bill of 100$ (for just 2 people) and I was still hungry after the fact because it was practically inedible the way it reeked. Yes I am picky so bear that in mind but it was very disappointing to pay such prices for such FISHY fish. Disgusting. Literally made me sick to my stomach.

Maybe we ordered the wrong thing but in such a nice place I had high hopes that the fish would be good.

Otherwise the drinks were well worth the price üëå

First time coming here: The service, food and atmosphere were incredible! Our server, Yang was amazing! Super friendly and helped us get some great photos and made great recommendations. She really helped shape the experience!

We had reservations arranged for 7pm, but we arrived completely earlier than we anticipated. The staff accommodated us immediately which was great. The service was excellent and the food was amazing, super tasty. The vibes here are truly zen and peaceful, which are rare to find. Over all, we had a wonderful experience and we will definitely be back soon.

Our experience at Jade Restaurant and Lounge was outstanding from start to finish. We chose to sit at the bar, where we were lucky to have Danny as our bartender. Danny was exceptionally professional, personable, and attentive ‚Äî he elevated our evening with excellent drink recommendations and genuine hospitality.

The atmosphere at Jade is sophisticated yet welcoming, making it perfect for a relaxed evening out. The cocktails were expertly crafted, and the food was beautifully prepared and full of flavor. Whether you‚Äôre seated at the bar or in the dining area, the level of service and attention to detail is consistently impressive.

Overall, Jade Restaurant and Lounge, with Danny behind the bar, delivered a top-tier experience that we look forward to enjoying again.

Indo-Chinese Fusion restaurant in Forest Hills, NY. Really charming area, right near the train station - the outside is inspired by old school German architecture. Inside is a classy restaurant with lots of decor and good photo opportunities.

We started out with a Thai iced tea and a passionfruit berry mocktail, both of which were delicious. We went straight to ordering entr√©es. We ordered the Chicken Manchurian, Chicken Malai Boti and Hakka noodles (veg).

The chicken Manchurian is spicy, be warned. However, it was extremely flavorful and saut√©ed in sauce with stir-fried vegetables. The vegetarian noodles were also quite delicious, mild in spice, and were a good accompaniment to the chicken. To try something different, we ordered the Malai Boti for more of a Pakistani flair. The chicken was grilled perfectly and was served with a tangy green chutney. Portion sizes here are generous for the price.

Overall: 9/10

Great atmosphere, great service the food was good but, could have used a bit more flavor and little less oil. Over all 4.5/5
We ordered the lollipop chicken, chicken korma, beef Mongolian and coconut shrimp.

I wouldn't come back here. Appetizers were good, drinks were ok but my Lobster was over cooked so I didn't enjoy it. Our waitress wasn't attentive, we had to keep calling her over until later on when we all ordered our food etc. The place is pretty though

Hosted my baby shower 5/3 @ 2:30 by lounge area (across bar). I totally forgot the names of the two guys who took care of us unfortunately but they were AMAZING. Everything was a 10/10. I have 0 complaints. Food and service were great. We were allowed to bring our own decor for table 30 minutes prior which was a plus. The place is clean and good lighting. They even have their own lighting for photos. Pricing per person is very reasonable. I highly recommend this place for events. I cannot wait to go back.
$18 lunch special is such a good deal the rock shrimp was my favorite part. Yang is a very sweet server! Will be back to look at the lounge

My partner and i went to Jade during restaurant week the food was amazing. I ordered the crab rangoon, fried chicken dumplings, shrimp pod noodles and the fried snapper. Jashan was my waiter and he was so welcoming, nice and checked in throughout our meal. A1 customer service. Will be coming back again!

I am a repeat jade customer. However, I recently went for my birthday and they fell short which is causing me to write this review. My friends and I go often for the $18 lunch which is amazing. I however haven‚Äôt had the entrees as I am obsessed with small plates like yellowfin tuna, king crab Rangoon and soup that they have.

Went on a Saturday evening, had a party of 10. My waitress was just all over the place, I get it, it‚Äôs busy, but I had to constantly ask for her to come back to place drink and food orders for my table. Keep in mind we spent almost 2k there so this was disappointing. Drinks were strong, Asian pear hits the spot everytime. Apps were awesome as usual and sushi was great.

Because they have the windows open we encountered small nats at our table, a puddle of water on floor that was never cleaned up before we even arrived and dead/broken iPads to use for menu ordering. My two friends who did order entree‚Äôs didn‚Äôt enjoy it but most did, I would say the night was hit or miss.

Desserts? 2/10, Jade please revisit the desserts - I BEG. I don‚Äôt know if they just take them out of the freezer or what but maybe a pastry chef is needed as the desserts are just not great.

I also had an issue with the lady at the front handling checks. She told me checks couldn‚Äôt be split even though I called in advance and asked if they could be - I was told yes. She argued with me until I asked for a manager, the manager then helped me with the check and was great.

I‚Äôll be back because I do enjoy the yellowtail and apps and drinks - 10/10 there, but there is so much room for improvement and I‚Äôm sad it missed the mark on my birthday. I would have also appreciated music to be louder by the pond area. Up by the bar is great. We didn‚Äôt hear anything down below.

This restaurant has amazing ambience and a beautiful atmosphere that makes the already delicious meal even more enjoyable. I got the Jade Roll and would get it again. The waiter was very attentive to us and ready to serve our table. I would eat here again.

My 4th time coming here, food is always just ok but the inside is pretty. Wouldn't have even left a review but I'm warming up takeout I got after eating yesterday and I find a big piece of egg shell in my drunken noodles

Superb vibe, pleasant atmosphere, great music and a good happy hour menu. Our host. Tashi was great. A great server took our orders and brought them in time. Service was super super fast. highly recommend it if you are in a rush or are you just literally made it before happy hour.
Omg guys!! You need to come here!! HAD THE BESTTT EXPERIENCE!! Cane for my birthday and it was beautiful inside. Arya was the best server ever!! Yall need to give her a raise! The food was very nice!

Jade is the place to be. The food is amazing and offers a wide variety of dishes. Manager Mo was so helpful in explaining the menu. She was well knowledgable and a great vibe. The drinks made by our lovely bartender Sertso. They had a kick to them but were delicious nonetheless. This is a must visit and overall great experience.

This place was awful! I went with two friends on a weeknight to grab dinner. Upon arrival we were seated in the back corner of the restaurant. My fork was filthy. And to top off the uncleanliness and isolation, the experience was worse! My‚Ä¶
Its not Thai food, more likely Indian. Basil rice cooked with basmati rice which is weird to me. But i love the sushi most it was awesome. Drinks pinacolda non alcoholic was amazing

Nice place,but a lot of old things inside,kinda to much in one place,pool in the middle with fish is nice ,but I would renovate entire place.
Food is very expensive and not cost this price,like lo mein 46$ for spaghetti and 6 small shrimp and few calamari , really?I ate 10 $ lo main more tasty then this one.
Lamp chops overpriced too and was burn.
Spicy food is too much spicy,even for people who likes spicy food.
Forrest hills roll was no taste at all and looking not presentable.
Service was good,but to often asking questions as well.To many workers around your table.Feel not comfortable to talk with your friends,always interactions.
Tips included to your check,be ready .

The food, service, and atmosphere at Jade are good. However, I give them 3 stars overall because they attempt to charge gratuity twice if you don't pay attention to the bill.  On my attached bill, they automatically added 20% gratuity on the bill at the bar for just two people. Then they show an additional 18%,20%, and 25% tip recommendations at the bottom of the bill.  I believe this is intentional, and it is a very  bad practice.

Jade Eatery & Lounge in Forest Hills is a stylish spot with a lot to offer.  We were pleasantly surprised to be seated immediately on a busy Saturday night without a reservation. The atmosphere is elegant and trendy, yet still manages to feel relaxed. The restaurant itself is spacious with a variety of seating options, including a lovely outdoor area.
Our cocktails were excellent! They have a really impressive drink menu with lots of creative choices.  The appetizers we ordered were also very tasty.  However, the entree selection was somewhat limited, which was the only downside to our experience.
Service was top-notch throughout the evening.  Our server was attentive and friendly, and the food arrived promptly.
Overall, Jade Eatery & Lounge is a great place for drinks and appetizers in a sophisticated setting.  I'd definitely recommend it for a night out with friends or a date. 4/5 stars!

This place was too cute and worth coming back to try new menu items( and get more photos) Overall the experience was tasty and laid back. My only gripe would be they do not send anything back if you didn‚Äôt like/not enjoy the preparation of the food. Out steam dumplings were very dry and noticeably filled with pan fried ground beef with minimal flavor. We only tried one and left the rest but couldn‚Äôt swap or remove from the bill. But the server offered a compromise that wasn‚Äôt the best but it was appreciated. ALSO the tiramisu is not traditional tiramisu, it‚Äôs cake, still tasty though üòã.

The food was amazing, but what truly stood out was our server, Ria. She was incredibly professional, attentive, and kind throughout our visit. Her warmth made the experience unforgettable‚ÄîI‚Äôll definitely be back!

I loved this restaurant!! My first time going and the vibe and atmosphere was so cool. If you‚Äôre one for aesthetics, this is the perfect place for you. As far as food goes, the menu offers so many diverse options. The food did not disappoint and neither did the service. Our server was Yang and she was so sweet. She took the time to answer any questions we had when we were deciding to order, and overall was such a nice conversationalist. She as well as the other staff made our experience very swift and enjoyable. Definitely recommend going.

Jade has a welcoming and fun atmosphere for happy hour or date night. Tahmid is an amazing waiter. He is very attentive, friendly and is able to anticipate the customers needs. Don‚Äôt walk‚Ä¶ RUN to Jade for a memorable experience.
Jayshawn was wonderful, he took over our table and it was seemless. Celebrated my 40th bday here with my girls and the experience was overall Amazing. Food and service

This was my third time coming to Jade and it was very disappointing. The food lacked flavor and presentation, the drinks were also not the best either. The staff were not as attentive or supportive considering it was a birthday dinner. Overall the service was not the best, and is truly saddening since the other two times I came the food and service was great.

UPDATE: I emailed them, they never replied, never offered a refund or anything like that. Don‚Äôt come here. Thanks!

The atmosphere was nice but on a Saturday night it was really packed. Service and seating could‚Äôve been faster being that we had reservations. Menus were on uncharged iPads, they ran out so we used our phones. The sesame chicken was 8/10. Chicken satay, mediocre 6/10. Basil fried rice w shrimp, medicore 7/10. Lychee martini 9/10. Crispy Thai skirt steak medium well, great pick 9/10. Lollipop chicken 7/10, regular fried chicken but the sauce was great. I would recommend to go on a weekday or weekend day due to the traffic. Zero parking In the area due to private residences, you will be walking or definitely getting a ticket/boot.

Staff were friendly and the ambiance created by the decorations really create an amusing environment; Especially for dates.

While I prefer physical menus, we were provided a QR code to choose our food and beverage options.

The food and appetizers came out quick. For those that are attempting to eat family style, the portions are on the smaller side. Food presentations on all the dishes were amazing. Each dish packed flavor and tasted great.

The overall price was on the higher end, but considering the location and quality of food, justified.

Bonus: Dishes are Halal!
Went here for my anniversary, the food was great! The drink was amazing!! Service was quick
The staff was nice! The food was good as well. But the place itself doesn‚Äôt seem very clean! There‚Äôs a smell inside the restaurant! They just need to pay more attention regarding that..

Start off by saying I was skeptical especially with General tso chicken but our waiter Nay was very nice and friendly and told us everything we needed to know but all the dishes we were interested in.My Wife and I really enjoyed our 15 year wedding anniversary thanks to Jade and our awesome waiter Nay

This place was amazing. I found it on Instagram. I went for my birthday on February 27 with a group of seven servers were very attentive food and drinks presentation was absolutely beautiful very great energy when it came down to singing happy birthday the atmosphere loved it. Great for taking pictures.

We had such a great time at Jade Eatery! Our server Sonam was super kind and attentive‚Äîhe made everything feel easy and fun. The food came out fast, was totally delicious, and Sonam even surprised my husband with a birthday dessert. So thoughtful!

Service: Amazing. Sonam really went the extra mile to make us feel at home.

Food: Every dish hit the spot, and the menu had plenty to choose from. We didn‚Äôt have to wait long, either.

Vibes & Decor: The place looks awesome‚Äîreally upscale and stylish without being stuffy. Perfect for a special night out or just a chill dinner with friends.

Halal-Friendly: Bonus points for being halal, which we really appreciate.

All in all, we totally recommend Jade Eatery. Big thanks to Sonam and the team for making it such a great experience!

Nothing bad to say about this place except for maybe the portion sizes.  From the moment you walk in, the ambience sets the perfect mood. The lighting is soft and inviting, and the decor gives off a warm, modern vibe that makes you feel right at home. Whether you're there for a casual meal or a special occasion, the atmosphere never disappoints.  My favorite part of the meal was the Lava Cake dessert ‚Äì it‚Äôs a must-try! Rich, warm, and oozing with warm and smooth chocolate, it‚Äôs the perfect way to end any meal. Paired with a scoop of vanilla ice cream, it‚Äôs the perfect pallet cleanser and sweet tooth fulfiller.  Highly recommend this spot for both the vibe and the incredible food.  You can come here with family, with friends, or even a date and you wouldn‚Äôt be upset.  All in all, great experience and would come back for sureüôåüèæ

My friend and I paid $60 for a drink, appetizer, main course, and dessert, and the food was absolutely delicious. My mocktail was amazing! The vibes inside are very cool and our server was so kind. I would come here again!

The location is right across from the LIRR- Forest Hills Station.  The food was tasty. I had the spicy Lamb, chicken lettuce cups, and the tamarind margaritas.  Everything I had was delicious. I'm looking forward to going again.  This place also had a coi pond. It's very nice for pictures but not intimate. The loud music makes customers talk louder.

I had such a wonderful experience dining here! The food was absolutely delicious‚Äîfresh, flavorful, and beautifully presented. What really stood out, though, was the service. Gompo took such great care of us throughout the meal. He was attentive, kind, and made sure everything was perfect from start to finish. It‚Äôs rare to find that level of hospitality these days, and it truly made the evening special.

Really good food!
NAY was nice and gave great service.
We will definitely come back!
